page.title: 14SOCIAL.The Lunch Club.
page.content: In the village of Wrotham there is a club where old age pensioners can chat and have lunch.The club meets every Thursday.A vast majority of the members have lived in Wrotham all their lives and one had only spent one week away from the village in her entire life.They would like to see a chemist's and a shop which sells old fashioned underwear also an improvement in the bus service.What they would really like is their own mini-bus.Since the by-pass has been built there is much less traffic passing through but in recent years there has been an increase in the number of motorbikes which some people find to be rather a nuisance Some of the members felt that too many new houses have been built but despite these minor grumbles most of the old people enjoy living there.
